professionalExperiences.title: Mobile and Website Developer at MomentumIas
professionalExperiences.description: Freelancing for MomentumIAS, a coaching institute for UPSC preparation, managing their mobile application and website. Providing support for day-to-day issues to ensure smooth operation and optimal user experience.

professionalExperiences.title: Jr. Flutter Developer at Hostbooks
professionalExperiences.description: Contributed to the development of the HostBooks app, a solution that revolutionizes business management. Played a key role as a front-end developer, creating responsive applications for both desktop and mobile platforms. Leveraged GetX for state management and employed the MVC architecture to ensure a seamless user experience.

professionalExperiences.title: Flutter Intern at Oyelabs
professionalExperiences.description: Contributed to Oyelabs grocery application project, which featured an aesthetically appealing user interface designed in Figma. My role involved implementing RESTful APIs, integrated Firebase for backend functionality, and incorporated Google Maps for location-based services.

academicExperiences.title: Google IT Automation with Python Professional Certificate
academicExperiences.description: After three years of preparing for the UPSC alongside my professional work, I am now exploring new technologies by pursuing the 'Google IT Automation with Python Professional Certificate' course on Coursera.

academicExperiences.title: Android Development Training
academicExperiences.description: After completing my second year of college, I used my summer vacation to learn new technologies and applied my Core Java skills in Android development. I also explored new tools to enhance my ability to build college projects, such as a Book Inventory Management application.

academicExperiences.title: Core Java Development Training
academicExperiences.description: After completing my first year of college, I utilized my summer vacation to learn new programming languages and deepen my understanding of object-oriented programming concepts in preparation for the upcoming semester.

academicExperiences.title: Completed Sr. Secondary School
academicExperiences.description: No segundo semestre de 2018 pude aprimorar meu nível de inglês (Nível Avançado) com a modalidade de conversação avançada pelo Instituto Federal do Jacareí (IFSP).

academicExperiences.title: Completed High School
academicExperiences.description: Ao final de 2017 me formei no ensino médio na escola Antônia Dias Sampaio em Jacareí.
